segments.text: I'm sorry , I've lost my tags and receipt . What can I do about it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I see . What is your baggage ? And do you remember the tag's number or color ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's a suitcase . Its colour is blue .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Could you give me a description of your case ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's like this , it's square with a leather cover .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'll check it for you . I've found it . Is this yours ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , it is the right one
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Will you show me your key card , please ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: All right . Now you can take your case away
segments.speaker: S2
